name: Jump For It!
description:
Welcome to Jump For It!

This is a game where you have to try and get Bob from the start of each course to the end, traversing an advanced landscape, requiring skills in parkour.

This game includes all your normal game aspects, such as: teleportation; animation that doesn't work in the way it was designed, but is somehow better; platforms that move you at the speed of light; as well as a whole lot more.

Please, if you will, enjoy the game! All feedback is greatly appreciated, so feel free to leave some! :)
